scripts.title: 해당 스크립트를 부를 키가 됩니다. 이름을 정확하게 적어주세요. ex. 강화소1

contents.name: 말하는 사람(시스템이면 비워두세요)
contents.script: <- 얘가 말하는 내용

contents.name: 위랑 같은 사람이 말해도 한 번 더 적어줘야 함
contents.script: 이하 생략

contents.name: Elieus
contents.script: You do not belong within this paradise.

contents.name: Elieus
contents.script: With the sun and moon both rising above you, you shall be submerged in eternal darkness.

contents.name: Yana
contents.script: In the name of the divine.

contents.name: Tubalcain
contents.script: A true knight does not yield to fear. En garde! Shall you be vanquished in no time.

contents.name: Rahel&Lea
contents.script: In His grace, I shall be eternally beautiful. Step aside, you mortal.

contents.name: The Triad
contents.script: Wisdom, power, and might. The power of the trinity can subjugate all

contents.name: Phanuel
contents.script: You intruder! How dare you bring the vile shadow of evil to the kingdom! Face the might of the royal, and vanish into the darkness.

contents.name: The Savior
contents.script: A being that should never have been born has come into existence. Now, it is time to set things right.
In this world devoid of light, I now realize its beauty.

contents.name: Messenger of faith
contents.script: Even if your hands were stained with the blood of 200 people, I shall still believe in you.

contents.name: Messenger of faith
contents.script: With strong faith, one can overcome any difficulty. May the sacred faith also dwell within your eyes.

contents.name: Messenger of faith
contents.script: A true believer who knows how to practice genuine faith and love may...

contents.name: Messenger of faith
contents.script: Do you know the story of the Good Samaritan? I wish to become such a presence for someone. To do so, one must fundamentally have unwavering faith in this world.

contents.name: Messenger of faith
contents.script: It feels like there's something else hiding within your faith. Is it just my delusion?

contents.name: Messenger of faith
contents.script: Your sins have become heavier, but it will all be fine. Perhaps what you need is an even deeper faith.

contents.name: Messenger of faith
contents.script: The divine instructed to love your neighbors. With love for mankind and hatred of sins, I shall not reproach you as well.

contents.name: Messenger of faith
contents.script: Since when did your hands become so stained with blood? Nevertheless, it will be fine. I... will trust you.

contents.name: Messenger of faith
contents.script: I am uncertain... Could belief and love save everyone?

contents.name: Messenger of faith
contents.script: I am now no longer sure if belief and love can truly save you.

contents.name: Messenger of faith
contents.script: Perhaps I may have never been saved.

contents.name: Messenger of faith
contents.script: What you give them is not belief and love. Yet they still follow you.

contents.name: Messenger of faith
contents.script: Your eyes always seem to be looking into the distance, without any doubt.

contents.name: Betrayer of faith
contents.script: Although I have never reproached you, you have committed sins so immense that are hard for me to even imagine. No. It was I who didn't realize that I was never redeemed in the first place.

contents.name: Betrayer of faith
contents.script: Does this world even exist in the first place? Or, is the world a marionette of the unknown?

contents.name: Betrayer of faith
contents.script: Now, I can't trust anything, not even myself. Even my own thoughts are terrifying. Could salvation ever be seeked?

contents.name: Messenger of faith
contents.script: I believe in the love that the divine has taught us. May you also receive grace within the belief.

contents.name: Messenger of faith
contents.script: I believe in the love that the divine has taught us. May you also receive grace within the belief.

contents.name: Messenger of faith
contents.script: May the path of your faith lead you to the right way.

contents.name: Messenger of faith
contents.script: Your path and mine. Which path shall be the answer? I... I'm not sure anymore.

contents.name: Messenger of faith
contents.script: If I take one more step, will a new path of faith appear? I await your answer.

contents.name: Betrayer of faith
contents.script: May you show us a new path of salvation.

contents.name: Messenger of faith
contents.script: The divine spoke, "Rise and go, as your faith has saved you." As such, I believe salvation lies within faith.

contents.name: Messenger of faith
contents.script: There is not a single falsehood in the teachings of the divine. I hope more people will awaken to this truth.

contents.name: Messenger of faith
contents.script: I dared to doubt the teachings of the divine. As a believer, I am deeply ashamed.

contents.name: Messenger of faith
contents.script: Your way seems to be closer to the path of salvation than my practice of belief and love.

contents.name: Betrayer of faith
contents.script: You are the blind shepherd, and I am the lost sheep.

contents.name: Messenger of hope
contents.script: The divine has bestowed upon me the ability to respond to your earnest prayers in the form of the stigmata. O wanderer, may I be able to pray for the grace I can bestow.

contents.name: Messenger of hope
contents.script: People offer prayers for various reasons, each important in its own way. When praying to the divine, people believe that countless wrongdoings in this world will be forgiven. Do you, I, or anyone else belong within that world?

contents.name: Messenger of hope
contents.script: I have a wish. The thing people call 'hope.' However, true hope is something I couldn't pray for. It's as confusing as facing oneself directly in the eye.

contents.name: Messenger of hope
contents.script: Everyone has their own pain. I do too. Perhaps the reason I offer my prayer is to find liberation, to find peace and serenity.

contents.name: Messenger of hope
contents.script: You... must be the wanderer that carried a special aspiration. What do you pray for this time?

contents.name: Messenger of hope
contents.script: My wish is... my wish is... my wish is....

contents.name: Messenger of hope
contents.script: You have already offered half of your prayers. It won't be long until all the grace within my reach is bestowed upon you.

contents.name: Messenger of hope
contents.script: May there be an end to all my struggles and suffering.

contents.name: Messenger of hope
contents.script: I have witnessed something. It has all begun after I met you. You must be the savior who has come to rescue us.

contents.name: Messenger of hope
contents.script: Now I am certain. You are the deity capable of fulfilling my wish.

contents.name: Messenger of hope
contents.script: The aspirations of others now seem foolish. Their prayers all appear meaningless.

contents.name: Messenger of hope
contents.script: I will only follow your prayers. I no longer wish to hear the foolish prayers of others.

contents.name: Betrayer of hope
contents.script: My wish has finally been answered. I have finally put my true wish into my prayer.

contents.name: Betrayer of hope
contents.script: I have seen something again. This time, the form was not vague but clear. It's all thanks to you.

contents.name: Betrayer of hope
contents.script: Ah, finally, my prayers have been answered!

contents.name: Messenger of hope
contents.script: May the prayers of the divine always accompany you on your journey.

contents.name: Messenger of hope
contents.script: May the prayers of the divine always accompany you on your journey.

contents.name: Messenger of hope
contents.script: I hope light shines upon your aspirations as well.

contents.name: Messenger of hope
contents.script: May your aspirations and mine become one.

contents.name: Messenger of hope
contents.script: May your aspirations bring salvation to us all.

contents.name: Betrayer of hope
contents.script: I pray for peace and tranquility on your journey.

contents.name: Messenger of hope
contents.script: Although the divine has granted me the mercy to bestow stigmata, I am just a mere sinner. If I could do something with the grace I've received...

contents.name: Messenger of hope
contents.script: You are an intriguing individual. The more I look into those eyes, the more certainty arises.

contents.name: Messenger of hope
contents.script: With the power you wield, it seems any wish can come true.

contents.name: Messenger of hope
contents.script: It feels like I have found my own hope.

contents.name: Betrayer of hope
contents.script: You are my new deity. May my abilities be of assistance to you.

contents.name: Messenger of love
contents.script: Sometimes it feels like they're hiding grotesque and vicious monsters within them. I can sense it with my instinct. But at the same time, I hope I'm wrong. I want to believe and love them for who they show me they are.

contents.name: Messenger of love
contents.script: Why is the world so full of hate? Why can't everyone just love each other...?

contents.name: Messenger of love
contents.script: I don't want to die. Death is sad. I also hate pain. I wish others don't have to suffer either.

contents.name: Messenger of love
contents.script: When I hear the birds chirping in the morning, my heart warms up. Every morning, they give me a reason to live and love this world.

contents.name: Messenger of love
contents.script: How many people are showing their true selves in this world?

contents.name: Messenger of love
contents.script: You seem very tired. Are you hurt?

contents.name: Messenger of love
contents.script: Isn't there a way for no one to suffer? If we love each other, wounds can heal without pain, can't they? I want to believe that, but to do so, I first need to strive to be such a warm person.

contents.name: Messenger of love
contents.script: After seeing their true selves, I realized that I was right, but I'm not happy at all. Something's wrong.

contents.name: Messenger of love
contents.script: Please don't prove it to me. No, please prove it.

contents.name: Messenger of love
contents.script: It feels like the more you use your power, the deeper you fall. Maybe I'm afraid I won't be able to escape. Is it because I still don't know something?

contents.name: Messenger of love
contents.script: The sound of birds chirping in the morning no longer reaches my ears.

contents.name: Messenger of love
contents.script: I want to rest.

contents.name: Messenger of love
contents.script: Perhaps I no longer want to know the truth. Was there even a truth? What's true and what's false? What's good and what's evil?

contents.name: Betrayer of love
contents.script: You're not a sinner. You were a savior. Yes, the warmth and love I believed before were all lies.

contents.name: Betrayer of love
contents.script: I don't deserve to love others. Including myself.

contents.name: Betrayer of love
contents.script: I like the new way of love you taught me.

contents.name: Messenger of love
contents.script: May you also be able to love this world.

contents.name: Messenger of love
contents.script: May you also be able to love this world.

contents.name: Messenger of love
contents.script: May the power of love also reach you.

contents.name: Messenger of love
contents.script: May your love come to me as well.

contents.name: Messenger of love
contents.script: Now I can see your path of love.

contents.name: Betrayer of love
contents.script: May more people awaken to your love.

contents.name: Messenger of love
contents.script: If there's love, anything is possible.

contents.name: Messenger of love
contents.script: I don't see love in your eyes. What's behind them?

contents.name: Messenger of love
contents.script: Now that I think about it, are you a sinner? Was I trying to believe and love a sinner?

contents.name: Messenger of love
contents.script: My heart feels stuffy. If it were you, could you alleviate this feeling?

contents.name: Betrayer of love
contents.script: I will continue to love this world in my own way. The power you've given me is my true way. Yes, even if it's like this, if I can help the world...
